title: Navigating Difficult Conversations Together
description: This journey is designed to guide you and your partner through the challenges of discussing sensitive topics in your relationship. Each day, you'll explore different aspects of communication, from establishing a solid foundation to tackling deeply personal subjects. By the end of this journey, you'll have the tools and confidence to engage in meaningful discussions, strengthening your emotional connection and mutual understanding.

subtopics.title: Establishing Open Communication
subtopics.description: Learn the importance of open communication and how to create a safe space for discussing hard topics. This subtopic will introduce basic communication strategies.

content.title: How do you prefer to communicate your needs and desires?
What's your favorite memory of us having a great conversation?

subtopics.title: Understanding Different Perspectives
subtopics.description: Explore the significance of empathy by understanding your partner's perspective on difficult topics. Discuss methods to approach disagreements constructively.

content.title: How can we ensure both of us feel heard during a disagreement?
How do you prefer to approach conversations when emotions run high?

subtopics.title: Navigating Jealousy and Trust
subtopics.description: Delve into feelings of jealousy and trust in your relationship. This subtopic focuses on how to discuss these tough feelings without conflict.

content.title: Have you ever felt jealous in our relationship? How did you handle it?
Do you think cheating only relate to physical things or is there emotional cheating as well?

subtopics.title: Setting Boundaries in Discussions
subtopics.description: Learn how to establish boundaries when discussing sensitive subjects to ensure both partners feel comfortable and respected during conversations.

content.title: Are there any boundaries around work that you'd like to set?
What's one boundary you'd like to set to keep our relationship healthy?

subtopics.title: Addressing Past Trauma
subtopics.description: Tackle conversations surrounding past traumas and how they may impact your relationship. This subtopic provides strategies for discussing these challenging topics delicately.

content.title: Have you had any childhood experiences that you can call traumatic? How has it affected you?
Have you had any unresolved issues with your parents?

subtopics.title: Conflict Resolution Strategies
subtopics.description: Develop your skills in resolving conflicts that arise during discussions. Explore techniques to turn arguments into opportunities for growth and mutual understanding.

content.title: How can we turn our arguments into opportunities for growth?
How do you prefer to resolve disagreements: calm discussion or taking a short break?
